root.name: Pick Axe Pete!
root.description: Pick Axe Pete (in Europe) or Pete Axe Pete! (in USA) is a Magnavox game very similar to Donkey Kong and others games that uses the same mechanic (fixed screen and some determined things to do) In Brazil, the game was released with the title: "Didi Na Mina Encantada". Didi Mocó (also know as Renato Aragão) is a famous brazilian comediant and some years before, he and his comedy group made a film called "Trapalhões Na Serra Pelada" that Didi act as a miner (the reason for his name in the cover).
